USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_vendors
AS
    BEGIN
        IF OBJECT_ID('silver.payment_type') IS NOT NULL
            DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type;
            
        CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type
        WITH(
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            LOCATION = 'silver/payment_type',
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
        )
        AS
        SELECT 
            payment_type,
            value AS payment_type_desc
            FROM
                OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
                    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0'
                )
                WITH(
                    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
                ) AS re
                CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
                WITH(
                    payment_type INT,
                    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
                ) AS re1
                CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
                WITH(
                    value VARCHAR(20)
                ) AS re2;
    END;
